name: Episode 3
title: Geoff is Intimidated by Gus
description: Good Morning, Gus. Gus & Geoff are back in the streets with lots of 'audio texture' as they have a cup of coffee from Flightpath while recording at local haunt Home Slice Pizza. Learn about Geoff being a call center phenom, Garage Sale Games, and how Gus & Geoff met on this week's ANMA Podcast.
